resources.string: Are you ready for an adventure?
Do you want to feel for a while like a modern castaway, stranded on a desert island?
Chrissi is a secluded, isolated, almost tropical island on the most southern end of crete.
Due to its unparallel beauty and it\'s unique ecosystem, it is under the protection of Natura 2000 Networking Programme, as a widlife refuge and an "area of intense natural beauty".
Hike outside the designated paths and beaches
Collect rocks, fossils, shells and ancient finds
Collect plant or do any animal cathcing
Start a fire or smoke around the bushes and woodlands
